mdRecord.dcterms:title: Desolation Wilderness from Emerald Bay Road
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Desolation Wilderness is a 63,960-acre (258.8 km2) federally protected wilderness area in the Eldorado National Forest and Lake Tahoe Basin Management Unit, in El Dorado County, California. The crest of the Sierra Nevada runs through it, just west of Lake Tahoe. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desolation_Wilderness [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
